categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: The Umbaran support ship, also known as the Separatist support ship, was used during the Battle of Umbara to support the Separatist armada clashing with the Republic Navy and to protect a Separatist supply ship sending long range missiles to support the local Umbaran militia. The Separatist supply ship was later destroyed by Fives, Jesse and Hardcase after they broke the Umbaran codes and attacked the supply ship with Umbaran starfighters.
